name: rUnstable (Whatabout)
description:
Life is Unstable, the only certainty you have is that you always have to keep going. You may think you have mastered it every now and then but life will always throw something at you that will destabilize your world and you need to adapt, quickly, otherwise it will run you aver like a train out of control.

That is the concept that this jam's theme inspired us and that led us to create this game. Eventually the life train will get everyone of us, how long will you be able to outrun it?

Find it out on rUnstable!

Controls

Can be played only with keyboard: UP / DOWN / LEFT / RIGHT

Every arrow executes a command but be ready to embrace change.

Team

We are a group of students of an Italian accademy. This is our first Jam project, we hope you enjoy it!

  • Girolamo Nobile: Game/Level Designer
  • Daniele Sichetti: Gameplay Designer, Blueprints, UI
  • Andrea Sciuto: Level Designer
  • Matteo Saliva: Character Designer, Cinematics Designer, SFX
Known Issues
  • Initial and Final cutscene, not present in the build
  • At the end, the screen fade black but the game is still running. Press Alt+F4 to close it.
Tools
  • Unreal Engine 4.25
  • Reallusion - Character Studio 3 (owned by Matteo Saliva)
Credits Music
  • Background: Prod. IOF - "Isolate" (this guy makes really good stuff, check it out 😄)
